posts.post_title: For Sale: T207 George "Bucky" Weaver SGC 10 SOLD

For Sale: T207 George "Bucky" Weaver SGC 10/1.

Thanks to everyone who emailed me.  I sent out emails in the order that I received them during my work day and the first one I emailed, emailed me back 1st and is taking the card.  SOLD

posts.post_title: For Sale: T207 George "Bucky" Weaver SGC 10 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Douple-P-Enterprises
Great sale on the Buck Weaver - I thought it was priced high but I should have jumped in.  I saw the PSA 5 with the tough "anonymous" back ending at MileHigh tonight was only at $1,700.  I guess that card would be a steal at anything under $2,500.  I'll try my luck
